Sentencas: In this study, we develop a large tubular solid oxide fuel cells design with several cells in series on a porous cermet support, which has many characteristics such as self-sealing, low Ohmic loss, high strength, and good thermal expansion coefficient matching.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: Here, we investigate aspects of the cell design, manufacture, performance, and application.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: Firstly, the cell length and number of cells in series are optimized by theoretical analysis.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: Then, thermal spraying is applied as a cost-effective method to prepare all the cell components.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: Finally, the performance of different types of cells and two types of stacks is characterized.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: The maximum output power of one tube, which had 20 cells in series, reaches 31 and 40.5 W at 800 and 900 A degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: Moreover, the output power of a stack assembled with 56 tubes, each with ten cells in series, reaches 800 W at 830 A degrees C.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance

Sentencas: The excellent single tube and cell stack performance suggest that thermally sprayed tubular SOFCs have significant potential for commercialized application.
Titulo: Thermally Sprayed Large Tubular Solid Oxide Fuel Cells and Its Stack: Geometry Optimization, Preparation, and Performance
